indian.details: 14 days ($68) if holding valid US/UK/EU visa. Else apply 48h/96h transit visa online.

activities.title: Burj Khalifa (At the Top)
activities.description: Views from the world's tallest building. Book online to save time. Metro: Red Line to Dubai Mall.

activities.title: Dubai Mall & Fountains
activities.description: World's largest mall. Aquarium, Ice Rink, and free Fountain show every 30 mins in evenings.

activities.title: Gold & Spice Souks
activities.description: Traditional market in Old Dubai (Deira). Take an Abra (boat) across the creek for 1 AED.

activities.title: Sleep 'n Fly Pods (T3)
activities.description: Igloo-style sleep pods inside Terminal 3. Perfect for 2-4 hour naps. No visa needed.

activities.title: Dubai Frame
activities.description: Iconic structure offering views of Old and New Dubai. Closer to airport than Burj Khalifa.

activities.title: Zen Garden (T3)
activities.description: Indoor oasis with lush greenery and fish ponds near Gate B7. Quiet zone for reading.

activities.title: Museum of the Future
activities.description: Stunning architecture and futuristic exhibits. Book tickets weeks in advance.

activities.title: Al Mallah Satwa (Shawarma)
activities.description: Legendary street food spot for Shawarma and Falafel. 20 mins from airport.
